channel.title: Houston Rockets on Bully Ball Pit
channel.description: Recent content in Houston Rockets on Bully Ball Pit

item.title: Trading Places: Wall and Westbrook
item.description: The NBA, more than any other major sport, is built around its players, with their unique skills and personalities driving fan interest and league revenues worldwide. It seems odd then that we only focus on team outcomes when analyzing trades. If it’s the players that really matter, then shouldn’t we also try to determine how their futures are impacted? I’ve decided to make an attempt at filling this gap, digging into the data and projecting who won this winter’s blockbuster trade between John Wall and Russell Westbrook.
